text: Longyang Subdistrict () is a subdistrict and the county seat of Hanshou County in Hunan, China. Dividing a part of the former Longyang Town (), the subdistrict was established in December 2015. It has an area of with a population of about 80,991 (as of 2016). The subdistrict has 11 communities and 5 villages under its jurisdiction, its seat is Chengnan Community ().according to About Longyang Subdistrict / 龙阳街道(概况), hanshou.gov (2017-07-18) ==Communities and villages== {| class="wikitable" | align=center colspan=4| 11 communities and 5 villages of Longyang Subdistrict |- align=center | align=center colspan=2|Communities and villages | align=center colspan=2|Communities and villages |- align=center ||English||Chinese||English||Chinese |- align=left ||Baotahe Community||宝塔河社区||Longzhuyuan Community||龙珠园社区 |- align=left ||Chengbei Community||城北社区||Nanjiao Community||南郊社区 |- align=left ||Chengdong Community||城东社区||Xinjie Community||新街社区 |- align=left ||Chengnan Community||城南社区||Sugongti Village||粟公堤村 |- align=left ||Chengxi Community||城西社区||Sujiapu Village||苏家铺村 |- align=left ||Huamulan Community||花木兰社区||Wanghaiping Village||王海坪村 |- align=left ||Huancheng Community||环城社区||Zhangjiahu Village||张家湖村 |- align=left ||Hucheng Community||护城社区||Zhenlongge Village||镇龙阁村 |} ==References== ==External links== * Official Website (Chinese / 中文) Category:Hanshou Category:County seats in Hunan Category:Subdistricts of Hunan
